title: I love it

In Snapchat you can post what you‚Äôre doing to your friends and family with your story and take a picture in a story in all of your friends and family can see it but also if you don‚Äôt want someone see you can you can do a private story Snapchat is it safe way to always have fun also you can send your location family and friends safely that‚Äôs what I love about Snapchat!!!!!

title: Why the AI
text:
Snapchat used to be a fun place for memories and keeping up with friends in their day-to-day lives. Now it‚Äôs become a ridiculous app that is full of just stupidity. I‚Äôm sorry for my language. Recently, a few months back added in AI thing that you can only get rid of with Snapchat+ which is the most ridiculous thing I‚Äôve ever heard of. It‚Äôs creepy it feels like it‚Äôs watching you and it‚Äôs constantly the first thing up there and it‚Äôs hard to ignore with how Snapchat works sometimes. I don‚Äôt want creepy AI all over my phone and it‚Äôs made me think about getting rid of Snapchat more than once.
There are so many other apps worth my time and money, and I think the peoples time as well. I would not be surprised if the rating for Snapchat continues to lower, and if they were to go out of business in the near future. Do not waste your time with this. Seriously not worth it. Huge issue with the AI. You have no idea what it has access to and they won‚Äôt let you get rid of it which, ended up feeling a tad violated.

title: App is getting super shady super fast
text: Highlighting sensationalist fake stories or news/gossip from ages ago, adding short videos to clog the feed and make you stay on the app longer, and spamming ads for premium and a paid AI. When they realize nobody wants to PAY to talk to a BOT they decide to add it to your friends list. Now every time I type ‚Äúmy‚Äù in chat or any word with ‚Äúai‚Äù in it the app suggests tagging the bot in my conversation. It‚Äôs always at the top of my chat list and cannot be removed which is extremely annoying and very unappealing. LITERALLY forcing it down everyone‚Äôs throat. It keeps track of your location, which I don‚Äôt mind since I take my phone with me everywhere, but why make the AI lie about knowing your location??? It will recommend nearby places and even give distance estimates but claims not to know exactly where I am? This app is very much not for the user and instead for the people/companies who pay for promotion, otherwise it would be very different.

title: Needs to invest more in Support
text: I‚Äôve had the app since it‚Äôs came out, I started it in late middle school/early high school and I‚Äôm a college graduate now. I‚Äôve enjoyed the app for so many years. The memories feature has been around since my son was one, he‚Äôs 9 now. I have years of memories of my child, friends, family & loved ones passed. I loved the app & used it more than any other social media. I got a new phone Saturday & was very disappointed that the first time contacting support in all these years they were utterly useless. I know the email on the account & they refuse to send a reset password or help verify the account any other way. Don‚Äôt expect to be listened to - let alone helped. I‚Äôve gotten the same copy pasta message from bots every time I submit a support request. If you reply to the email it auto tells you that they‚Äôre ending correspondence. I just want to talk to a person & have a little empathy in the situation. Seeing how apple & Verizon has treated this vs snapchat shows the difference a good (human) support makes.

title: Still can't delete or activate 2FA
text: Extremely insecure. If you are willing to risk some stranger just signing into your account, having your name, birthday, phone number, and email address, because you made your account when you were a teen and wasn't smart enough to put in all fake info, then the app is fine. However if you're someone who actually likes security, you're screwed. Can't activate 2FA and haven't been able to for about a week now, can't delete my account either. At least I could finally change my password after a week of struggling! How great, if someone had broken into my account I wouldn't have been able to change my password to save it. Refusing to let people delete their accounts so you can have inflated numbers is ridiculous. Let people delete. I'm seriously this close to just trying to spam add people or flagging my own account so snapchat takes it down for me, since they clearly have the ability to delete accounts, they just won't let you do it yourself.

title: Im about to delete this app permanently
text:
IF YOU PLAN ON GETTING THIS APP, READ THIS FIRST‚Ä¶ 
I got an error message that it needs access to my camera but when I took all the necessary steps to do just that, it was as if this app never asked for that permission in the first place. I reached out for support and got calls and emails that never actually went through to my phone. Like I was actively reading one of the many articles they send which have nothing to do with the actual issue and I never got the notification of a call nor an email but low and behold when I went back to my home page I had two missed calls and a voicemail that said it was their ‚Äúfinal attempt to contact me‚Äù in the span it took me to look over an article that was talking about forgetting your password. 
Annoyed, I went online to see if anyone had a similar issue and I found SO MANY other people with the exact same issue. 
If it doesn‚Äôt get resolved in the next 24 hours I‚Äôm done and I know multiple people who have already done so.

title: Let us have the option on bitmoji styles.
text: Hear me out, I have had snapchat for quite some time now. I got it back in 2019, and the bitmojis were great. I didn‚Äôt want them to get changed and I just liked them how they were. But, after some years I realized Snapchat had a update with the bitmojis. I wasn‚Äôt to happy about it, but I was still okay with it. Now, the bitmojis have changed AGAIN, and I dislike them even more. Please Snapchat, if you‚Äôre going to change the style of our bitmojis, please atleast let us have the option of which style we would prefer. We can have the OG style, the 2D or 3D. We should be able to decide what we get to see on our Snapchat and how we would like it. I see most people have not been fond about this update, and to be quite honest I haven‚Äôt been either. I just feel it would be a really good idea to add Bitmoji style in the settings or something where we can pick which bitmoji styles we would like displayed on our Snapchat. Thank you if you are listening/hearing my opinion.

title: Uhh

title: Creepy
text:
Don't download. Creepy stalker like app more so than most social media platforms.

The app used to be a fun way to keep up with friends and share your day. Recently they rolled out a My AI chatbot feature that has undisclosed access to your snaps (photos you send on the app) and chats (private and group messaging). I took a photo of my face and sent to a friend and the same instant I did that the AI chat bot sent me a message about "having a nice hair day" even though I never sent the AI bot a photo neither did I post a photo to a public or private story. The app just reeks blatant creepy and makes no effort to hide the fact they are tracking and analyzing you. At least other platforms try to act like they care about privacy. Snap does not.

There is also no way to not share your location with the AI. The company claims the bot does not have access to geolocation services but a simple prompt for it to find restaurants near you shows that it can indeed access location. That's not to mention the companies evasive answers when asked about what data the bot has access to. They claim that no new data is accessed by the bot. Which is true but amounts to nothing as users share camera, audio, location and more with the app AND THERE'S NO WAY TO HIDE THIS DATA FROM THE AI. 

Adding to the underhanded feature is the fact that you are not able to unsubscribe from the AI bot unless you pay for snap chat plus. You should not need to pay to have a feature removed.

title: Horrible customer service and bugs
text:
My snapchat account has been ‚Äútemporarily disabled‚Äù for around 2-3 months now. No explanation as to why, no violations of the app, just one day working fine and the next I‚Äôm completely barred from accessing my account on my iPhone- and from what I‚Äôve read online this is a pretty common problem for people, some people even having to get new phones just to access their account on snapchat.
Now something like this is usually a pretty simple fix on other social media platforms: spot an issue, email them, have your problem solved. Done and done. But I and many others online have been dealing with this bug for months, even reaching out in any ways possible, and still no fix to our problem. If I could get this patched and go back to being able to use snapchat on my phone freely then I would 100% give this app a 5 star. But because of it‚Äôs lack of customer support and incompetence at helping it‚Äôs users, I cannot give this app anything but a 1 star.

title: It‚Äôs a good app but I just had a little problem
text: I love this app you can use filters and chat with friends and it‚Äôs overall a good app but my issue is wen Snapchat was acting up it would just not let me write and I had to delete it and install it back and since I was already logged in I thought there was not going to be such  a big deal going back to my acc but wen I clicked the app after downloading I couldn‚Äôt log back since I forgot my password I pressed ‚Äúforgot my password‚Äùand I made a new one and when I was gonna log back in it wouldn‚Äôt let me. It would say I had to wait a little bit because I kept trying to log back in then wen I was going to try again It wouldn‚Äôt let me so I use another account and which my main account had all of my pictures since December and now I can‚Äôt have them but overall it‚Äôs a good app.

title: Stop suggesting people to me!
text:
I‚Äôve been using Snapchat for years, mainly as a way to text with friends who live overseas. And it‚Äôs great for that. But over the past year or so, the app has gotten more aggressive with sending me ‚Äúnotifications‚Äù that are just an attempt to increase engagement rather than actually giving me useful info. Many of these are in the form of ‚Äúthis person who we think you know is on Snapchat!‚Äù It doesn‚Äôt have access to my contacts in my phone, so I‚Äôm not sure how it gets info on who to recommend to me, but it‚Äôs got a nasty habit of recommending people I actively don‚Äôt want to talk to, including most recently the wife of an ex I haven‚Äôt spoken to in over a decade. The ex is not in my phone contacts, I‚Äôm not still in touch with any of his friends, and I‚Äôve never even met his wife (only know her name because someone in my circle is still friends with him on Facebook).

So I‚Äôve found another texting app that‚Äôs apparently better at privacy (based on reviews and a rec from a friend), and I‚Äôm deleting Snap.

title: Good App, Bad Customer Service
text: I use this app a lot and enjoy saving things because they don‚Äôt save to my camera roll. The fact that there‚Äôs no way to get those back after your account has been deleted/ you‚Äôve been locked out (or maybe due to a failed two-factor authentication or smth) is extremely frustrating. I've lost over six years of memories, not to mention messages and other important contacts. I like that it's safe but I hope there can be more help for the users in the future, when they lose access to this stuff. I've lost memories of people who have passed, that I'll never get back, and it just hurts my brain to know they're floating around but I can't get to them simply because I am locked out. Wish there was better customer service to get that back, as it might not sound so serious to the workers but these memories really are priceless and as someone with memory issues, this is extremely frustrating.

title: Bring back 2D bitmojis!!!
text: The 3D stuff has been so ugly & it just keeps getting uglier. They used to be so cute. Now people don‚Äôt even try to make them cute cuz what‚Äôs the pointüò≠ if ur a smart company make them 2D again. If u can‚Äôt, then at least give the user the option on what style they want to use. Cuz I can guarantee no one would choose the 3D stuff. It looks like a skinwalker. Smart companies listen to reviews & see that there are thousands of people deleting their bitmojis all together. Something needs to change because all the feedback is bad. If nothing changes, we see you guys don‚Äôt care about your users feedback & it‚Äôs a slap in the face to all the people who have been using your app for 10+ years. Listen to the people!!!! 2D we‚Äôre begging!!!! Please recognize that people have to be really upset to open up the App Store and write an entire review about something. People have to go out of their way to do that & usually only do that when we really disagree with something. The 3d ones give uncanny valley...

title: Acct Locked For NO REASON
text:
I appealed your decision to permanently lock my account over two months ago, and still haven‚Äôt heard anything back. In the meantime, I haven‚Äôt even been able to create a new account so that I can use Snapchat at all. 

I am still completely unsure as to what I did to be permanently locked out of this account. The only thing I can think of is that I MAY HAVE accidentally posted something to my public stories that I meant to send to someone privately. If this violated a guideline, I wasn‚Äôt even given a warning. How can I correct something if I‚Äôm never given a warning about it? Someone could have hacked me and posted something inappropriate without my permission or knowledge. To just permanently lock me out with no warning or inquiry seems absolutely extreme. 

I used snap to stay in touch with a lot of people. You literally locked me out one day, out of nowhere. And It‚Äôs so hard to get answers or actual customer service from you guys. It‚Äôs really upsetting. ZERO STARS UNTIL YOU PROVIDE ACTUAL CUSTOMER SERVICE

title: Had since launch
text: I‚Äôve had the app since it launched when I was in college, and initially it was a fun concept. It was very simple, and now it‚Äôs evolved into this bloated, cringy revenue machine. I mean, good for the devs for making a profit for their hard work, but the content that isn‚Äôt just interacting with friends and fun filters has become unbearably uninteresting. It‚Äôs all irrelevant clickbait tabloid crap and while I know I‚Äôve definitely aged out of the target audience, I‚Äôm finally deleting it for good. Everything in the discover tab is just recycled memes, 10 year old vines, or just trash content. It provides an outlet for a whole generation to turn to the internet as a viable career and I hate to say it, but most people aren‚Äôt very funny or talented in that way. HOWEVER, that isn‚Äôt the devs fault. The app is well designed, runs well, and has made a very logical progression to its current form. Nice job Snapchat, just not for me. I‚Äôll go back to watching my programs at the nursing home now.

title: New AI Bot.
text: I understand where Snapchat was coming from thinking the AI bot would be a cool new feature, but I absolutely hate it. I did not want it, didn‚Äôt even update my snapchat. It randomly appeared yesterday and not only can‚Äôt I remove it, I can‚Äôt even unpin it from the top of my chat screen. Yet the only way to do it is to subscribe to snapchat plus? to remove a feature NONE OF US WANTED? it‚Äôs ridiculous. i used to love this app, thought it was a great way to chat with friends, now they are all removing it because they hate the new AI feature - I don‚Äôt blame them. It‚Äôs ridiculous that they gave us a feature none of us wanted, literally shoved it in our faces and also pushed it to the very top of our screens when we just want to chats with our friends AND we can‚Äôt get rid of it. Tell me why you can remove TEAM SNAPCHAT from the chat screen but can‚Äôt remove an unwelcome AI bot that NO ONE knew about until yesterday when they dropped it on us unannounced. It‚Äôs just unfair and in all honestly makes me not even wanna use the app.

title: Ring Flash Update
text: I've been using snap for like 6-8 years now and have always loved it..... until now. Let me explain: I recently updated Snapchat to the newest version and oh my god I want to delete the app so badly, and I would... if I didn't use it to talk to 99% of my friends. The new ring flash is HORRENDOUS. The second I open up the camera I'm instantly blinded by the terrible ring like feature, not to mention how terrible the quality of photos look with it! I get it, yeah it's cool and trendy, but at least make an option in the settings where you can turn it off completely. I use the normal front flash feature and love it, and the quality is stellar on my 13 Pro. It doesn't automatically turn on when you decide you want to use flash, and it only flashes when you take the photo. I hate this update so much. Seriously Snapchat... fix this ASAP please. I'm beyond tired of this update.

title: No support
text: I have had my account for 7 years now and a few weeks ago, my account was locked due to inappropriate activity that I don‚Äôt even know what the activity was.  I‚Äôve tried several times to reach out to customer service in which they just have you use the automated system. The automated system does not help at all so I emailed the support that was emailing me back and basically they told me there‚Äôs nothing they can do and they will no longer be contacting me, when I tell you, they absolutely help with nothing. They didn‚Äôt even ask for any information about the situation and they honestly didn‚Äôt care. It really hurt because I‚Äôve lost so much pictures, videos, and conversations from the last seven years are all gone Snapchat didn‚Äôt even care to help me.  Also. of right now because my number attached my old account. It‚Äôs still showing suspicious activity. So I cannot even use my phone number to verify my new account Snapchat has really been a nightmare this last month.

title: The new AI
text:
I love snap, but I dislike how they put this new AI on the app, you can‚Äôt even get rid of it all, maybe Snapchat will realize that AI should have never been added to snap in the first place and that they will take it off, it used to be were if you paid you got the AI now it‚Äôs just showing up on peoples account, the fact that you can‚Äôt ‚Äúblock‚Äù it, ‚Äúunadd‚Äù or somehow get rid of it so it‚Äôs not on your account is very sketchy, so Dear Snapchat, either make it to where people can get rid of it or get it off your app please

And now apparently the AI is hackers getting into people‚Äôs accounts and going through there memories and hidden pictures and posting peoples stuff and hacking into peoples phones,  this AI technology isn‚Äôt a game and quite frankly to many younger children are on this app and should not have access to something like that

This feature should have been optional if y'all just had to put it on the app, but personally there are enough apps about AI so it‚Äôd be great if y'all got rid of it completely

title: A glitch in Snapchat
text: I‚Äôve had Snapchat for as long as I can remember I‚Äôve already reached out to support multiple times to see if they can fix the issue and as it may be small it still drives me nuts. I know that when the yellow dot appears on your profile that it normally means you have notifications that haven‚Äôt been opened I‚Äôve watched videos on how to fix it and they all tell me the same things which I have tried multiple times. This dot will not go away no matter what I try or how many times I‚Äôve reached out to support a lot of people have been complaining about it no the app doesn‚Äôt need updating I‚Äôve checked that too. I go through all the people that have added me and clear that out too. It‚Äôs just something that Snapchat needs to get on top of and fix. I‚Äôm hoping by chance that maybe their team will see this and see to it and finally fix it.

title: Love the app, hate the update
text: Snapchat is one of my main forms of communication becuase it‚Äôs quick and easy to just send a snap to your friends and it‚Äôs fun in my opinion being a student in school. However the new update is absolutely killing me. I know a lot of people my age do ‚Äústreaks‚Äù including myself. However due to the new update my streaks end within hours. Where I used to be able to go three days without answering a snap and being able to keep a streak, now if I don‚Äôt respond within an hour or the other person doesn‚Äôt respond within an hour the streak ends. I think that it‚Äôs just completely stupid. It‚Äôs not expensive or anything so that‚Äôs why I don‚Äôt mind it as much. But it‚Äôs still highly annoying and seeing as how I‚Äôm a student paying for classes I‚Äôm not wanting to spend money on this. I‚Äôm not sure if this is a problem for other people but I just wanted to share

title: My Ai, why I don't like it.
text: Snapchat has been in my life for 2 years and I have loved the app. The only thing that  bothers me is how My AI has repinned on top of everyone else, (yes you read that right, repinned) which are the closest people in my life (which aren't many)‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏èI unpinned it when it first came out and just today, about 3 weeks later, it pinned itself back on the top of everything.‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏èI would think users who don't talk to it or decide they don't want to see it up there should be able to at least unpin it. I think it's extremely unfair to have to pay to get it removed. It's also a minor safety situation, as a minor myself, I know what computers and technology are capable of when they get ahold of only a little piece of personal information. Who knows where in the heck that is going to and who is receiving it??? I hope you take my review into consideration because I know I'm not the only one who is upset and doesn't feel safe about having My Ai.

title: Director Tool is Pointless
text: For a long time I‚Äôve had to re-select all of my favorite lenses every day because they would all be deleted by the following day (total design fail but I got used to it).  Since Director mode was launched I cannot even use other lenses, there is no way to select a filter and use it to create a 60-second video.  No matter how much time I spend re-saving the same set of lenses I save over and over every day, once I hit Directors Mode I lose every lens.  I can‚Äôt go into the Lenses area to access my favorites  because there is now a permanent graphic that only appeared a few days ago that says to press and hold to add to your favorites but it blocks access to that screen.  I don‚Äôt understand why the engineers at Snapchat continually make operating this app harder, but it‚Äôs become way more confusing lately and trying to get ahold of someone to assist is a total waste of time.

title: Friend‚Äôs and family
text:
I love Snapchat because you get to talk to your family even if they live very far away because when you get to Snapchat theirs this thing called chat and you can send videos to your friends and/or family. You can invite and amount of friends you want and and also make a group chat. And not only can you chat you can also call or FaceTime them or send them pictures. Lastly you can make selfies of your own by using the filters and you can also watch videos from other Snapchat users.

I definitely recommend using this app it is better than facebook or twitter and way more kid friendly for 10-14. I am 11 years old and this app is way more kid friendly than other apps so kids and adults can use this app super fun.

title: Extremely Impressed
text: I really have just been using the AI for research purposes.  It‚Äôs so much fun to build on your AI.  What you say makes a huge difference with what kind of experience you will get with your AI.  You can also create a bio and more for your AI.  I think the AI is the future and it‚Äôs exciting to have the privilege and honor to use and test.  I am very grateful for its creation, thank you.  My suggestion for you though is to create an option to customize the appearance of the avatar associated with your AI.  When you have more data storage and other maybe think of introducing a option that allows you to have no limitations with conversation caps.  In short this has been one of the greatest and most fun apps I have ever used.  I am with y‚Äôall to the end, thank you.  Take care.

title: Locked Accounts
text: I have absolutely no issue with snapchat. it‚Äôs a great app, but when they ban the account i‚Äôve had for 6 years without any warning or reasoning, it hurts. i‚Äôve never done anything wrong on the app, and i still haven‚Äôt gotten any explanation what do ever as to what i did. i have so many memories on my account i have saved no where else. memories of deceased relatives , photos and videos of my friends, photos from vacation, etc. Also, i have many family and friends in ireland and england, and snapchat is my only way of communicating to them. now that‚Äôs taken away from me. snapchat you need to implement a warning feature before you go and ban someone forever over one single thing, and if ur gunna not gunna do that, at least give the user a specific reason as to why they got banned. what‚Äôs the point of using the app if i‚Äôm gunna get banned for no reason, lose everything i had on the account, and have 0 help from the support team as to what i did and if i can get it back. it‚Äôs dumb

title: Cool but Chats (& Groups)
text:
Most recent update at time of review.

Love the app. Hate how videos in chats send in 10 second increments. It wasn‚Äôt always like this like it started with some update. The individual increments isn‚Äôt really the issue like it‚Äôs weird, but hey at least if I want to cut out a certain part of the video I can delete the entire segment from the chat (would be better to just cut that part of the video, but ig you can only edit individual segments of memories also so whatever). The issue is that there isn‚Äôt an auto play between segments so the people you send videos to have to watch the video 10 seconds at a time. It‚Äôs annoying.

Would also be dope if the person that created a group had the option for more like admin/owner power over the group (e.g. ability to remove people from the group or the option/ability to not allow others to change the name)

title: Don‚Äôt get hacked! Snapchat customer service is awful.
text:
Apparently snapchats customer service is as useless as any app nowadays. I got a lot of my information accessed and several accounts of mine were being accessed without my knowledge. I had to cancel and contact so many friends, family, and accounts to make sure I didn‚Äôt get banned from certain apps just in case something happened. 

I forgot about my Snapchat until my friend mentioned it to me, and I couldn‚Äôt access it. So I told Snapchat exactly what I just said above, and they told me ‚Äúnothing we can do‚Äù like how? I don‚Äôt even know what happened to get the account banned. But they swiftly responded and said ‚Äúthey will not longer contact me about this‚Äù like I‚Äôm sorry my account got hacked by some awful person, but the fact I can‚Äôt even make a new account is crazy to me. And even crazier how fast they shut me down! 

This reminds so much of how awful hinges customer service is! Got banned there with no knowledge of what I did there either!

title: Permanently Locked Accounts
text: Why do y‚Äôall make it genuinely impossible to get account bans lifted/unlocked? I just lost years of pictures and memories, all of my friends; over practically nothing. Teens and young adults use this app; I‚Äôve seen worse/more scandalous things on snapchats story feature thing than I‚Äôve seen on stories actual people post. It‚Äôs unreasonable to permanently lock someone out over a single incident. At least implement a strike feature or something. What happened was this: I was asked by someone to shout out his acc on a private story so I did, an got permanently banned for it. At least review the account before deleting it. I had my life practically documented on that acc an really just lost it all. I can‚Äôt even make a new account either. I tried logging into an old account and it told me that account was locked too. I never post or text people from my backup acc, so developers just took it down just because it‚Äôs simply on the same phone. Fix your app please, like for real.

title: Bring back the old bitmojis
text: I‚Äôve enjoyed Snapchat since I got it 2 years ago, it‚Äôs a great way to stay in touch with friends and keep up with everything going on. All I have to say is PLEASE fix the bitmojis. The 2d bitmojis were perfect. Easy to edit, they looked really good, animated but reasonably accurate to real life. Then you guys made them 3d. Less accurate to real life, despite the extra dimension. Most peoples looked worse than before. Not many people liked them but we dealt with them. These latest changes are just entirely horrid, however. Literally no one‚Äôs is accurate to real life, they all are extravagantly ugly, and I hate getting any notification from the app now due to not wanting to see these putrid bitmojis pop up on my phone. Please, at least regress back to the first 3d model, if not 2d. They were so, so much better. I haven‚Äôt met a single person who doesn‚Äôt agree.

title: too many irritating features now

title: üòê
text:
I‚Äôve used Snapchat for several years and have been quite seasoned in experience using it. I used it to communicate with friends and coworkers, post with my friends, etc. After many of these years, my account was abruptly locked. No warning. No email. I knew this would already be a problem considering Snapchat is notoriously known for having terrible customer service.

Snapchat‚Äôs customer service is a joke. The response time is terrible, they are generally unhelpful, and use the same auto-generated message. Because of the ‚Äúsuspicious nature‚Äù of my activity and trying to get my account back, I‚Äôm unable to use this app. Like I said before, the app is great for silly pictures, storing memories  (which I‚Äôve had for years, that are now all gone), and communication. It‚Äôs always been fun. But their attitude towards making the quality of the app generally worse, like adding a glitchy AI, random bans and useless ads makes this app annoying to work with. It‚Äôs probably for the best that it‚Äôs gone.

title: My girlfriend was permanently locked from her account for absolutely no reason
text: 11+ years of memories, pictures, videos, conversations, are all completely gone without any kind of warning. We have tried troubleshooting everything. We have tried contacting Snapchat support but they have done absolutely nothing to help. She lost everything for no reason. It is extremely frustrating and incredibly sad. No temporary lock, not even an explanation. What an absolute embarrassment of a company. She is not alone either. After researching any kind of solution to get her account back, we found countless people being permanently locked from their account for no reason daily. Unless Snapchat can fix this problem and get her and other unjustly locked people‚Äôs accounts back, I do not recommend using this app to store any kind of photos or videos or any kind of memory. You can legitimately lose everything randomly for no reason and no explanation at all. Snapchat fix this.

title: Unjustified bans & political agenda &bots
text:
Wouldn‚Äôt be a shocker that snapchat is 100% leftist and protects leftist views even though they claim to not side in politics. I have had 2 accounts permanently banned for posting Catholic views and memes which the ban is violating not only freedom of speech but as well freedom of religion. I am very disappointed because I didn‚Äôt think snapchat would be intoxicated by the left mongering agenda and would at least be neutral. I have had other friends also get their accounts permanently removed losing all their memories from years ago for just meme posts between friends, truly outrageous. 

Apart from being tyrants, they seem to prioritize removing Catholics in snapchat over adult content bots that constantly add you and try to get you into their ‚Äúonlyfans or webs‚Äù you would think a billion net worth app can solve their bot issue but they seem to be too focused on banning Catholics and conservatives. Truly shameful. We will see what action to take on this matter, over all 1 star experience in 6+ years.

title: The Ai bot is annoying
text:
I‚Äôve had snapchat for just about a year now, and I‚Äôve noticed many flaws about the app that need to be addressed. (1) my account has been hacked/locked many times. (2) the app doesn‚Äôt run smoothly, and sometimes glitches (3) there are many bots that send inappropriate content to your account. That is just some flaws I have seen. 
   Im not sure if this is just a one time thing or something, but as of today, Snapchat has added a ai bot feature to everyone‚Äôs accounts. I find this ai very annoying because not only is this bot pinned to the top of your chat feed, it‚Äôs also something some can‚Äôt ignore. I tested the feature out a little and I found that it slowly pressures you into telling it things. For example, the bot will ask ‚Äúcan I help with something‚Äù then if you reply ‚Äúnope bye‚Äù the bot will say ‚Äúsomething seems wrong you can tell me‚Äù which is kinda creepy because it seems like I‚Äôm giving snapchat my information‚Ä¶ snapchat! Please remove this feature!!!

title: ‚ÄúBanned‚Äù?

I just want my pictures back and to let everyone know I‚Äôm alive and I‚Äôm ok.

title: PLEASE SNAPPYWAPPY PLEASE
text: TLDR: Snaps halloweeen bitmoji update made me pass out, and lowered my self esteem after knowing that thing gets more girls than me. So I, like any normal person, was watching a good old classic horror movie(Barney), when I heard a weird gurgling noise coming from somewhere. I look down and realize it my phone üòü. So I check what‚Äôs up, Snapchat sent me a snap. As I see this my first thought isn‚Äôt what happened to this poor thing? Does it need a gofundme to get its face back to normal? NO. THAT WAS NOT MY FIRST THOUGHT. I don‚Äôt remember my first thought actually, because I past out right on the spot. I woke up later in the hospital bed, when I see it staring at me, the bitmoji that looks like it got its face sat on by a sumo wrestler. I immediately pass out again and this is my first time waking up since then‚Ä¶

title: Next they‚Äôll make it impossible to ghost your location to the public
text: Snapchat has never been my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù chatting platform and the more I learn the less fond I am. However it has sunk to a particular kind of low by forcing a new algorithm onto its users. The ‚ÄúMy AI‚Äù bot is structured as if you are chatting with an old friend, but there‚Äôs nothing familiar or friendly about this synthetic representative. It‚Äôs scary enough that human contact was controlled so elaborately during the Covid shut down, but this version of technology is replacing our man to man fellowship altogether. The idea behind chatting apps was to be able to connect with people from far away. Snapchat mixed reality with fun by bringing into it a visual experience, then adding the silly filters we No and love. However, it‚Äôs gone completely off the deep end by prioritizing our interactions with legitimate robots rather than our loved ones. When robots become our ‚Äúfriends‚Äù we might as well resign from our work places and let them do the thinking for us.

title: I USED to love this app
text:
I used to absolutely love this app. It‚Äôs been my main form of communication for YEARS with everyone of my friends. Love the streaks, I finally hit 1000 with my fianc√© a few months ago and was so excited. Then yesterday. 
Snapchat updated and brought the worst spam with it that CANNOT be removed unless you decide to pay for Snapchat+. This stupid AI has messed up my experience and makes me want to delete the app. Something that is in bata testing for the paywall portion of Snapchat should not be on the free side of it. As many others have said, get rid of it before you lose a whole bunch of users. 
Bring more free options back into Snapchat - like the games that have been removed, a better search function for bitmojis. I can‚Äôt find the one I want to use ever anymore. 
Just please from all us broke people out there REMOVE AI‚ÄôS PAY WALL. Make it so we can remove it if we want. There are probably some out there that love that feature but the majority of us don‚Äôt it seems like.
